title: Young X-Men (001 - 012) (2008 - 2009) (Digital) (AnPymGold-Empir
description:
Young X-Men (001 - 012) (2008 - 2009) (Digital) (AnPymGold-Empire)


In the wake of Messiah CompleX, there are no X-Men and young mutants Rockslide, Blindfold and Dust are alone and directionless. Until the day Cyclops recruits them to hunt the new incarnation of the Brotherhood Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and kill them. Joined by a pair of new recruits, Ink and Wolfcub, the young X-Men learn a hard truth about the world post-Messiah CompleX: sometimes old allies make for deadly enemies. 

The series was a reboot of the very popular New X-Men series. This series came with a different writer and art-team and starring just a few of the team-members that where in the New X-men series. Many fans where disappointed by the decision to stop the cult-favorite New X-men and never picked up Young X-men, getting this series cancelled with issue 12, making it the shortest ongoing X-men series in years.
